if self:IsMouseOver() and TMW.ME.draggingFrame and self ~= TMW.ME.draggingFrame then if TMW.ME.draggingButton == "LeftButton" then local sourceID = TMW.ME.draggingFrame:GetParent():GetID() local destID = self:GetParent():GetID() local delta = abs(sourceID - destID)
if sourceID > destID then for i = destID, sourceID - 1, 1 do TMW.ME:SwapIcons(i, i + 1) end else for i = sourceID, destID - 1, 1 do TMW.ME:SwapIcons(i, i + 1) end end
TMW.ME.draggingFrame = self
elseif TMW.ME.draggingButton == "RightButton" then
TMW.ME:SwapIcons(TMW.ME.draggingFrame:GetParent():GetID(), TMW.ME.draggingOriginalFrame:GetParent():GetID()) TMW.ME:SwapIcons(self:GetParent():GetID(), TMW.ME.draggingOriginalFrame:GetParent():GetID())
